description: This table contains covered employment by industry collected for the Quarterly Census of Employment and Wages (QCEW) report which publishes every NAICS industry for the more than 3,000 counties in the United States.Publicly available files include data on the number of establishments, monthly employment, and quarterly wages, by NAICS industry, by county, by ownership sector, for the entire United States. These data are aggregated to annual levels, to higher industry levels, including NAICS industry groups, sectors, and supersectors.

metadata.attribution: CDLE - Colorado Department of Labor & Employment

name: Employment by Industry from Census of Employment and Wages
